name: Test to verify that user gets an error when criteria type validation on a number parameter is breached after re-running validation with a least count parameterized value
description: This test case validates the defined error when criteria type validation with parameterized value is breached after re running validation with least count parameterized value
descriptionHtml: This test case validates the defined error when criteria type validation with parameterized value is breached after re running validation with least count parameterized value
